attributes.action: Re-establish the 13 colonies to ensure stable American government.
attributes.additional_details: Such domestic instability cannot be allowed, for the good of the western hemisphere and the world.
attributes.background: With the current United States election, it has become clear that the country is so divided it is unable to trust, let alone govern, itself. As such, the government of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Island should re-establish the 13 colonies on the continent.

rejection.details: The governance of the United States of America is a matter for people and institutions of the United States, not the UK Government or House of Commons.
